mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CAMP_NO , C.CAMP_NAME , C.CAMP_ADDRESS , G.FILE_ROUTE , G.FILE_NAME FROM CAMP C JOIN CAMP_FILE F ON C.CAMP_NO = F.CAMP_NO JOIN IMAGEFILE G ON F.FILE_NO = G.FILE_NO WHERE C.CAMP_ADDRESS LIKE '%강원도%' AND C.CAMP_STATUS = 'Y' AND G.FILE_STATUS = 'N' AND G.FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM < 6

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COUNT(E.ROOM_NO) , C.CAMP_NO , C.CAMP_NAME , SUBSTR(C.CAMP_ADDRESS, 0, INSTR(C.CAMP_ADDRESS, ' ', 1, 2)) AS "CAMP_ADDRESS" , G.FILE_ROUTE , G.FILE_NAME FROM CAMP C JOIN CAMP_FILE F ON C.CAMP_NO = F.CAMP_NO JOIN IMAGEFILE G ON F.FILE_NO = G.FILE_NO JOIN ROOM R ON R.CAMP_NO = C.CAMP_NO JOIN RESERVE E ON E.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_NO WHERE C.CAMP_STATUS = 'Y' AND G.FILE_STATUS = 'N' AND G.FILE_LEVEL = 1 GROUP BY E.ROOM_NO , C.CAMP_NO , C.CAMP_NAME , C.CAMP_ADDRESS , G.FILE_ROUTE , G.FILE_NAME ORDER BY COUNT(E.ROOM_NO) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CAMP_NO , C.CAMP_NAME , SUBSTR(C.CAMP_ADDRESS, 0, INSTR(C.CAMP_ADDRESS, ' ', 1, 2)) AS "CAMP_ADDRESS" , G.FILE_ROUTE , G.FILE_NAME FROM CAMP C JOIN CAMP_FILE F ON C.CAMP_NO = F.CAMP_NO JOIN IMAGEFILE G ON F.FILE_NO = G.FILE_NO JOIN CAMP_RECORD R ON C.CAMP_NO = R.CAMP_NO WHERE C.CAMP_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.RECORD_NO = 2 AND G.FILE_STATUS = 'N' AND G.FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY R.RECORD_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM < 4
